reviews.text: Staff were amazingly friendly and helpful. Frontdesk service was perfect! Our room was spotless and beautiful. Fireplace was a wonderful feature. They thought of every need! So cosy and wonderful. The furniture and fixtures are all new. Great place. I like antiques and this was not special and unique like that, but for a new place, it was great.

reviews.title: Beauty in the Mountains
reviews.text: Great place, Great Prices! My husband and I and his brother and girlfriend booked a two night weekend. They had the upstairs unit and we had the downstairs. We had so much fun. Perfect for skiing, relaxing in the hot tub, many laughs. Malarkeys is a great place for a few drinks. It was a pleasant atmosphere. Crotched mountain was less than a mile away. Great, easy mountain. Would recommend to groups of friends or family during the ski season. On site they had skating, sledding (huge hill), provided sleds, great bar and restaurant, very friendly staff. Would recommend an early check in and late check out so you can make the most of your days.

description: Crotched Mountain Resort is a timeless retreat where once a toll was collected from traveling stagecoaches and wagons located just 60 miles from nearby Boston. 24 spacious one and two bedroom suites are like your home away from home, featuring fully equipped kitchens and fireplaces in the living area. The resort also features an outdoor swimming pool, two Har-Tru clay tennis courts, a community hot tub and casual dining at the on-site restaurant Toll Booth Tavern. Experience the most charming location in New England. Designed to be your own private hideaway, Crotched Mountain Resort is absolutely perfect for romantic getaways, family vacations, ski trips and golf outings.
